sections.heading: of judge; adjournment until next regular term
sections.text: If the judge does not appear by 5 p.m. in the afternoon of the fourth day, the court shall stand adjourned until the next regular term.SourceLaws 1879, § 30, p. 88;R.S.1913, § 1165;C.S.1922, § 1088;C.S.1929, § 27-306;R.S.1943, § 24-306.AnnotationsIn adjo
